name: Plugins with invalid auto-complete data log appropriate error on startup
objective: To verify that plugins don't automatically run upon reinstalling.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Go to system console
  2. Upload a modified version of the demo plugin with invalid trigger (Attached)
  3. Enable plugin
inline.expectedResult:
- Plugin crashes when you enable it
- Log shows:
failed to register agenda command: invalid autocomplete data in command: An empty command name in the autocomplete data
